featured.text: A triumph for medical technology, Oddsson’s fish skin transplantation was actually part of the astonishing achievement of “100% Fish,” an ambitious task in promoting environmental efficiency.

Another spectator said that too many Americans take the achievements of the space program for granted.
Firstborns, under normal circumstances, are usually the most strongly motivated toward achievement.

other.text: Of his many achievements, probably the least well- known are his accomplishments in music.

To congratulate Tom on his wonderful achievement.

definition.zh_def: 成就；成功達成的結果或目標
definition.en_def: A thing done successfully, typically by effort, courage, or skill.
definition.example: Winning the championship was her greatest achievement.
